animeTitle: Kyoukai no Kanata Movie 2: I'll Be Here - Mirai-hen (Dub)
otherNames: Beyond the Boundary: I'll Be Here - Future, Beyond the Boundary Movie, Kyokai no Kanata Movie, 劇場版 境界の彼方 I'LL BE HERE 未来篇
synopsis: The story takes place one year after the TV series. Akihito, half human and half youmu, fights against a new threat that intends on seeking Mirai whilst protecting his closest friends.
